entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 18 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
